webinar.title: Present Like a Pro
elaborateLearning: How to use stories for effective presentation?
How to create impactful slides and pitch decks to persuade the audience?
How to overcome the fear of presenting?
How language impacts your journey towards being an enticing storyteller?
webinar.description:
Anas has been a brand strategist and an educationist for the past two decades who weaves impeccable storytelling skills into his presentations.
In this EMC you will learn the essential skills that are required to be a great presenter and public speaker. This 3-4 hour long LIVE Experiential Micro Course, divided in 2 sessions, helps you get started on your journey to becoming a master storyteller and using stories to drive home your point.

  • Will you be a master presenter by the end of this course? No! But you will have the essential tricks and strategy to becoming one through practice.
  • Learn to deal with and overcome the fear of public speaking that stops most people from becoming great public speakers.
  • Learn the role of language in your journey towards being a great storyteller.
webinar.shortDescription: Every time you talk to somebody, you basically present your case. This module basically teaches you how to do it like you have always been a pro at it.
webinar.additionalContentOne:
In recent years there has been a rise in video-based learning platforms on the internet. While learning through recorded videos is somewhat helpful, it misses the point when the learner has a doubt, as there is no way to get your doubts answered on the spot.

Learning platforms that provide LIVE webinars kind of solve the above mentioned problem, but at the heart they still are 'web seminars', and hence monotonous and boring. BTW, have you ever learnt better at a boring class?

To solve these fundamental problems that plague the generic learning process on the internet, and make the whole process fun, interactive, as well as 'outcome focused', our team at scool designed 'Experiential Micro Courses(EMC)', which keep the 'experience' at the heart of it all-

  • EMCs are always LIVE- Ask your mentor whatever and whenever
  • 50:50 Mentor-Learner Participation- Increased interactivity and ZERO boredom
  • Outcome Focused- And hence the 'learner' is at the centre
  • Peer Learning- Don't we learn more when we learn together?
  • Inverted Classroom- Focus on LIVE problem solving
webinar.whyThisWebinarContent: This course is for anyone who wants to become better at or start presenting and public speaking. In todays economy communication is a mandatory skill set to excel, so if you wish to excel in life, both professionally as well as personally then yes this EMC is just for you.
